title: SEMP - Software Engineer Management Tools
shot_description: Assign. Track. Review. All in one internal tool.
description: In-House Work Management Tool (Jira-like System) This software was developed as an internal project to streamline employee task management. Inspired by tools like Jira, it provides core functionality for assigning, tracking, and reviewing tasks within an organization.

title: Jyoti
shot_description: Developed a loan-based e-commerce platform enabling rural customers to buy electronics on EMI.
description: This software is a loan-based e-commerce system designed to help people in rural areas purchase electronic items—such as mobile phones, fans, and TVs—on EMI (Equated Monthly Installment) plans.

title: BHP – Bandhan Health Program
shot_description: Promoting safe motherhood and child nutrition in rural communities.
description: This program aims to promote health awareness and improve the overall wellbeing of underprivileged families. It places special focus on children under five, pregnant women, lactating mothers, and adolescent girls, addressing key issues such as safe motherhood, child nutrition, personal hygiene, and sanitation.

title: US Based Project
description: US-based Project: A kidney dialysis center digital transformation initiative where nurses previously recorded dialysis and non-dialysis treatment details on paper flow sheets. The process was migrated to an electronic data capture system, enabling nurses to log in and record treatment data directly on iPads assigned to them individually.
